    • Method Detail

      • javascript_sendCommMsg

        public void javascript_sendCommMsg(java.lang.String command)

        Set of commands which where require to inform the webview, what action is taken on Android.

        "javascript:sendCommMsg('videoCall')" : Call this method while starting ANT Video call *

        "javascript:sendCommMsg('audioCall')" : Call this method while starting ANT audio call *

        "javascript:sendCommMsg('videoCallStop')" : Call this method while stopping ANT call

        "javascript:sendCommMsg('screenShareStop')": Call this method while stopping Screen share from mobile (ANT). Sends message that native screenshare is stopped.

        "javascript:sendCommMsg('screenShare')" : Call this method while starting Screen share from mobile device (ANT). Send message that native screenshare is started.

        "javascript:sendCommMsg('muteCamera')" : : Call this method when Local camera is paused (ANT). Send message that local camera is muted/pause

        "javascript:sendCommMsg('unmuteCamera')" : Call this method when Local camera resumes (ANT). Send message that native local camera is unpaused

        "javascript:sendCommMsg('videoCallStop')" : Send message that native video call is stopped via action or button click. Call nativeCallStopped first and then followed by this api

        "javascript:sendCommMsg('nativeCallStopped')" : This call is must to reset the flag. Call when conference is stopped or leave meeting called. Send message that ANT call stopped.

        Parameters:
        command -

      • javascript_execOnTV

        public void javascript_execOnTV(java.lang.String command)

        Set of commands which where require to inform the webview, what action is taken on Android.

        "javascript:execOnTV('finalexit')" : Call this method when user send message that he is exit meeting. (Instant Meeting)
        Callback: The Webview load the Index page url. Based on this hide the Webview and show the Native Indexpage form.

        "javascript:execOnTV('end') ": Call this method when user send message that he is exit meeting for all. (Instant Meeting)
        Callback: The Webview load the Index page url. Based on this hide the Webview and show the Native Indexpage form.

        "javascript:execOnTV('showWB')" : Call this method when user send message to open WB

        "javascript:execOnTV('hideWB')" : Call this method when user send message to hide WB

        "javascript:execOnTV('showChat')" : Call this method when user send message to open chat view

        "javascript:execOnTV('hideChat')" : Call this method when user send message to hide chat view

        "javascript:execOnTV('showInfo')" : Call this method when user send message to open Info view

        "javascript:execOnTV('hideInfo')" : Call this method when user send message to hide Info view

        "javascript:execOnTV('showParticipant')" : Call this method when user send message to open user list view

        "javascript:execOnTV('hideParticipant')" : Call this method when user send message to hide user list view

        "javascript:execOnTV('nativeCallStarted')" : Call this method when user send message to start the Native ANT call.

        "javascript:execOnTV('answerAudio')" : Call this method when user accept audio call (Normal Meeting)

        "javascript:execOnTV('answerVideo')" : Call this method when user accept video call (Normal Meeting)

        "javascript:execOnTV('endCall')" : Call this method when user end call

        "javascript:execOnTV('callVideo')" : Call this method when user click video call button

        "javascript:execOnTV('callAudio')": Call this method when user click audio call button

        "javascript:execOnTV('pause')" : Call this method when user clicks pause camera button

        "javascript:execOnTV('mute')": Call this method when user click mute mic button

        "javascript:execOnTV('exit')": Call this method when user exit room
        Callback: In Join Meeting : The Webview load the Index page url. Based on this hide the Webview and show the Native Indexpage form.
        In Instant meeting : WebAppInterfaceTV 'showEndMeeting' method will get called. Based on this show the Alert dialog for Exit.

        --------------------27-Dec-2020-----------------New API----------------------------------------------------------------

        "javascript:execOnTV('showAIsetup')": Call this method when user click AI button to open AI setting.

        "javascript:execOnTV('hideAIsetup')": Call this method when click AI button to close AI setting

        "javascript:execOnTV('showHelp')": Call this method when click Help button to open Help setting

        "javascript:execOnTV('hideHelp')": Call this method when click Help button to close Help setting

        "javascript:execOnTV('showProfilePicsetup')": Call this method when click ProfilePic button to open ProfilePic setting

        "javascript:execOnTV('hideProfilePicsetup')": Call this method when click ProfilePic button to close ProfilePic setting

        "javascript:execOnTV('showAVsetup')": Call this method when click AV setup button to open AV setup setting

        "javascript:execOnTV('hideAVsetup')": Call this method when click AV setup button to close AV setup setting

        "javascript:execOnTV('')": Call this method when click Help button to close Help setting.

        Parameters:
        command -

      • javascript_joinroomTV

        public void javascript_joinroomTV(java.lang.String meetingId,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String password,
                                  java.lang.String pwdEmail)

        call this method to Join the meeting with meeting id or Webinar id.
        Callback: This will load the Meeting room in the webview. Based on this show the Webview and hide the Native Indexpage form.

        "javascript:joinroomTV('12345678','irevo','','')"

        Parameters:
        meetingId -
        name -
        password - : empty if not set
        pwdEmail - : empty if not set

      • javascript_checkroomTV

        public void javascript_checkroomTV(java.lang.String meetingId)

        call to check if the meeting is created with common password or user level password : (Show Email id and Password field on callback) for authentication.
        Callback: Expected to get callback in 3 sec. callback API :'showPass' or/And 'showEmail'. These are mentioned in WebAppInterfaceTV.
        If above callback API is not comes in 3 sec, call 'javascript_joinroomTV' method to Join the meeting with Password and Email field empty.
        Calling of this API is mandatory before calling 'javascript_joinroomTV' method

        "javascript:checkroomTV('12345678')"

        Parameters:
        meetingId -

      • javascript_raiseHandFunction

        public void javascript_raiseHandFunction()

        call for sending the signal to remote that hand is raised. Use in Webinar mode.

        "javascript:raiseHandFunction()"

      • javascript_joinroomTV

        public void javascript_joinroomTV(java.lang.String roomName,
                                  java.lang.String email,
                                  java.lang.String password)

        Call for creating the instant room.
        Callback: This will load the Meeting room in the webview. Based on this show the Webview and hide the Native Indexpage form.

        "javascript:createinstantroomTV('iRevo','abc@xyz.com','12345678')"

        Parameters:
        roomName -
        email -
        password -
